lead_paragraph: Additional students defrauded by the now-defunct Corinthian Colleges were made eligible.

headline.print_headline: More Students Eligible for Loan Forgiveness
headline.main: More Students Eligible for Loan Forgiveness

snippet: Additional students defrauded by the now-defunct Corinthian Colleges were made eligible.
abstract: United States Dept of Education announces it will discharge additional number of student loan obligations for students defrauded by defunct Corinthian Colleges.
